messages.text: <@U01AJUF2GEP> set the channel purpose: We've amazing packages for creating Animations in Julia. These include Javis.jl, Animations.jl and Makie.jl. In this channel, people can submit queries, and animations made in Julia.
messages.purpose: We've amazing packages for creating Animations in Julia. These include Javis.jl, Animations.jl and Makie.jl. In this channel, people can submit queries, and animations made in Julia.

messages.text: Hello! I apologize if this was unnecessary, but I found it odd that such a channel didn't exist already!:sweat_smile:

elements.text: Hello! I apologize if this was unnecessary, but I found it odd that such a channel didn't exist already!

messages.text: Thanks for the creation. <@US64J0NPQ>  and I are mostly active in Zulip for Javis questions atm. We were a bit afraid of the slack hole but happy to answer questions here as well

elements.text: and I are mostly active in Zulip for Javis questions atm. We were a bit afraid of the slack hole but happy to answer questions here as well

messages.text:
<@U7K185TUN> Thanks! I didn't know that... A lot of stuff is shifting to Zulip from Slack...
I'm guessing the "not-disappearing-chats" is that attractive...:sweat_smile:
Anyway, I'll search for Javis there then.
This channel exists in case someone either wants to showcase their animation or submit their queries/issues!
